name: Raptor with flowers
description:
In the game you have to solve a sequence of puzzles involving the use of effects of different colors.

Management:

W-Jump

A/D-Walking

F-Open the crafting panel

R-Open crafting tips

E by box-you toss the box

E by flower-you collect a petal

LBM - Shot with the effect of a hat

Color effects:

Red + Turquoise = cloning the box

Red + red + turquoise = Increasing the size of the box

Black + turquoise = When moving from one location to another, you will not lose the petals

Black = When it hits the box, it will be attracted to you / when it hits the flower, it will fall into your inventory

Blue + red = when you jump into the heu from a height of about 6 boxes, you teleport to another body of water

Tips for mechanics:

1) When moving from one location to another, you lose all the petals, also at the level you entered, all the flowers will become active again, large boxes will become small, and the cloned box will disappear.

2) If you stand on the box and shoot it with a black whistle, then you will take off with the box

3) With a large weight, the vines can break off

4)Boxes can be thrown harder if you press E many times

5)By placing a box on your head, you can easily remove it from the wall

6)Effects such as teleport and transfer of petals are applied to the player, you can understand that the effect was applied by the particles that come out of the hat

7)Tomatoes die from any light source
